cards.name: The Magician
cards.meaning_up: Skill, diplomacy, address, subtlety; sickness, pain, loss, disaster, snares of enemies; self-confidence, will; the Querent, if male.
cards.meaning_rev: Physician, Magus, mental disease, disgrace, disquiet.
cards.desc: A youthful figure in the robe of a magician...

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.meaning_up: Secrets, mystery, the future as yet unrevealed...
cards.meaning_rev: Passion, moral or physical ardour, conceit, surface knowledge.
cards.desc: She has the lunar crescent at her feet...

cards.name: The Empress
cards.meaning_up: Fruitfulness, action, initiative, length of days...
cards.meaning_rev: Light, truth, the unravelling of involved matters...
cards.desc: A stately figure, seated, having rich vestments...

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.meaning_up: Stability, power, protection, realization...
cards.meaning_rev: Benevolence, compassion, credit...
cards.desc: He has a form of the Crux ansata for his sceptre...

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.meaning_up: Marriage, alliance, captivity, servitude...
cards.meaning_rev: Society, good understanding, concord...
cards.desc: He wears the triple crown and is seated between two pillars...

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.meaning_up: Attraction, love, beauty, trials overcome.
cards.meaning_rev: Failure, foolish designs...
cards.desc: The sun shines in the zenith...

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.meaning_up: Succour, providence also war, triumph...
cards.meaning_rev: Riot, quarrel, dispute, litigation, defeat.
cards.desc: An erect and princely figure carrying a drawn sword...

cards.name: Fortitude
cards.meaning_up: Power, energy, action, courage, magnanimity...
cards.meaning_rev: Despotism, abuse if power, weakness...
cards.desc: A woman, over whose head there broods the same symbol...

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.meaning_up: Prudence, circumspection; also and especially treason...
cards.meaning_rev: Concealment, disguise, policy, fear...
cards.desc: The variation from the conventional models in this card...

cards.name: Wheel Of Fortune
cards.meaning_up: Destiny, fortune, success, elevation, luck, felicity.
cards.meaning_rev: Increase, abundance, superfluity.
cards.desc: In this symbol I have again followed the reconstruction...

cards.name: Justice
cards.meaning_up: Equity, rightness, probity, executive...
cards.meaning_rev: Law in all its departments, legal complications...
cards.desc: As this card follows the traditional symbolism...

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.meaning_up: Wisdom, circumspection, discernment, trials...
cards.meaning_rev: Selfishness, the crowd, body politic.
cards.desc: The gallows from which he is suspended forms a Tau cross...

cards.name: Death
cards.meaning_up: End, mortality, destruction, corruption...
cards.meaning_rev: Inertia, sleep, lethargy, petrifaction...
cards.desc: The veil or mask of life is perpetuated in change...

cards.name: Temperance
cards.meaning_up: Economy, moderation, frugality, management...
cards.meaning_rev: Things connected with churches, religions...
cards.desc: A winged angel, with the sign of the sun upon his forehead...

cards.name: The Devil
cards.meaning_up: Ravage, violence, vehemence, extraordinary efforts...
cards.meaning_rev: Evil fatality, weakness, pettiness, blindness.
cards.desc: The design is an accommodation, mean or harmony...

cards.name: The Tower
cards.meaning_up: Misery, distress, indigence, adversity, calamity...
cards.meaning_rev: According to one account, the same in a lesser degree...
cards.desc: Occult explanations attached to this card are meagre...

cards.name: The Star
cards.meaning_up: Loss, theft, privation, abandonment...
cards.meaning_rev: Arrogance, haughtiness, impotence.
cards.desc: A great, radiant star of eight rays...

cards.name: The Moon
cards.meaning_up: Hidden enemies, danger, calumny, darkness...
cards.meaning_rev: Instability, inconstancy, silence...
cards.desc: The distinction between this card and some of the conventional types...

cards.name: The Sun
cards.meaning_up: Material happiness, fortunate marriage, contentment.
cards.meaning_rev: The same in a lesser sense.
cards.desc: The naked child mounted on a white horse...

cards.name: The Last Judgment
cards.meaning_up: Change of position, renewal, outcome...
cards.meaning_rev: Weakness, pusillanimity, simplicity...
cards.desc: I have said that this symbol is essentially invariable...

cards.name: The Fool
cards.meaning_up: Folly, mania, extravagance, intoxication...
cards.meaning_rev: Negligence, absence, distribution, carelessness...
cards.desc: With light step, as if earth and its trammels...

cards.name: The World
cards.meaning_up: Assured success, recompense, voyage, route...
cards.meaning_rev: Inertia, fixity, stagnation, permanence.
cards.desc: As this final message of the Major Trumps is unchanged...

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.meaning_up: Dark young man, faithful, a lover, an envoy...
cards.meaning_rev: Anecdotes, announcements, evil news...
cards.desc: In a scene similar to the former...

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.meaning_up: Departure, absence, flight, emigration...
cards.meaning_rev: Rupture, division, interruption, discord.
cards.desc: He is shewn as if upon a journey...

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.meaning_up: A dark woman, countrywoman, friendly, chaste...
cards.meaning_rev: Good, economical, obliging, serviceable...
cards.desc: The Wands throughout this suit are always in leaf...

cards.name: King of Wands
cards.meaning_up: Dark man, friendly, countryman, generally married...
cards.meaning_rev: Good, but severe; austere, yet tolerant.
cards.desc: The physical and emotional nature to which this card is attributed...

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.meaning_up: Creation, invention, enterprise, the powers which result in these...
cards.meaning_rev: Fall, decadence, ruin, perdition, to perish also a certain clouded joy.
cards.desc: A hand issuing from a cloud grasps a stout wand or club.

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.meaning_up: Between the alternative readings there is no marriage possible...
cards.meaning_rev: Surprise, wonder, enchantment, emotion, trouble, fear.
cards.desc: A tall man looks from a battlemented roof over sea and shore...

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.meaning_up: He symbolizes established strength, enterprise, effort, trade...
cards.meaning_rev: The end of troubles, suspension or cessation of adversity...
cards.desc: A calm, stately personage, with his back turned...

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.meaning_up: They are for once almost on the surface...
cards.meaning_rev: The meaning remains unaltered; it is prosperity, increase...
cards.desc: From the four great staves planted in the foreground...

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.meaning_up: Imitation, as, for example, sham fight...
cards.meaning_rev: Litigation, disputes, trickery, contradiction.
cards.desc: A posse of youths, who are brandishing staves...

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.meaning_up: The card has been so designed that it can cover several significations...
cards.meaning_rev: Apprehension, fear, as of a victorious enemy at the gate...
cards.desc: A laurelled horseman bears one staff adorned with a laurel crown...

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.meaning_up: It is a card of valour, for, on the surface, six are attacking one...
cards.meaning_rev: Perplexity, embarrassments, anxiety. It is also a caution against indecision.
cards.desc: A young man on a craggy eminence brandishing a staff...

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.meaning_up: Activity in undertakings, the path of such activity...
cards.meaning_rev: Arrows of jealousy, internal dispute, stingings of conscience...
cards.desc: The card represents motion through the immovable...

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.meaning_up: The card signifies strength in opposition...
cards.meaning_rev: Obstacles, adversity, calamity.
cards.desc: The figure leans upon his staff and has an expectant look...

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.meaning_up: A card of many significances, and some of the readings cannot be harmonized...
cards.meaning_rev: Contrarieties, difficulties, intrigues, and their analogies.
cards.desc: A man oppressed by the weight of the ten staves which he is carrying.

cards.name: Page of Cups
cards.meaning_up: Fair young man, one impelled to render service...
cards.meaning_rev: Taste, inclination, attachment, seduction, deception, artifice.
cards.desc: A fair, pleasing, somewhat effeminate page...

cards.name: Knight of Cups
cards.meaning_up: Arrival, approach--sometimes that of a messenger...
cards.meaning_rev: Trickery, artifice, subtlety, swindling, duplicity, fraud.
cards.desc: Graceful, but not warlike; riding quietly...

cards.name: Queen of Cups
cards.meaning_up: Good, fair woman; honest, devoted woman...
cards.meaning_rev: The accounts vary; good woman; otherwise, distinguished woman...
cards.desc: Beautiful, fair, dreamy--as one who sees visions in a cup...

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.meaning_up: Fair man, man of business, law, or divinity...
cards.meaning_rev: Dishonest, double-dealing man; roguery, exaction...
cards.desc: He holds a short sceptre in his left hand and a great cup...

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.meaning_up: House of the true heart, joy, content, abode...
cards.meaning_rev: House of the false heart, mutation, instability, revolution.
cards.desc: The waters are beneath, and thereon are water-lilies...

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.meaning_up: Love, passion, friendship, affinity, union...
cards.meaning_rev: Lust, cupidity, jealousy, wish, desire...
cards.desc: A youth and maiden are pledging one another...

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.meaning_up: The conclusion of any matter in plenty, perfection and merriment...
cards.meaning_rev: Expedition, dispatch, achievement, end...
cards.desc: Maidens in a garden-ground with cups uplifted...

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.meaning_up: Weariness, disgust, aversion, imaginary vexations...
cards.meaning_rev: Novelty, presage, new instruction, new relations.
cards.desc: A young man is seated under a tree and contemplates...

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.meaning_up: A dark, cloaked figure, looking sideways at three prone cups...
cards.meaning_rev: News, alliances, affinity, consanguinity, ancestry...
cards.desc: A dark, cloaked figure, looking sideways at three prone cups...

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.meaning_up: A card of the past and of memories, looking back...
cards.meaning_rev: The future, renewal, that which will come to pass presently.
cards.desc: Children in an old garden, their cups filled with flowers.

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.meaning_up: Fairy favours, images of reflection, sentiment...
cards.meaning_rev: Desire, will, determination, project.
cards.desc: Strange chalices of vision, but the images are more especially...

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.meaning_up: The card speaks for itself on the surface...
cards.meaning_rev: Great joy, happiness, feasting.
cards.desc: A man of dejected aspect is deserting the cups of his felicity...

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.meaning_up: Concord, contentment, physical bien-être...
cards.meaning_rev: Truth, loyalty, liberty; but the readings vary...
cards.desc: A goodly personage has feasted to his heart's content...

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.meaning_up: Contentment, repose of the entire heart...
cards.meaning_rev: Repose of the false heart, indignation, violence.
cards.desc: Appearance of Cups in a rainbow; it is contemplated in wonder...

cards.name: Page of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Application, study, scholarship, reflection...
cards.meaning_rev: Prodigality, dissipation, liberality, luxury; unfavourable news.
cards.desc: A youthful figure, looking intently at the pentacle...

cards.name: Knight of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Utility, serviceableness, interest, responsibility...
cards.meaning_rev: inertia, idleness, repose of that kind, stagnation...
cards.desc: He rides a slow, enduring, heavy horse, to which his own aspect corresponds...

cards.name: Queen of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Opulence, generosity, magnificence, security, liberty.
cards.meaning_rev: Evil, suspicion, suspense, fear, mistrust.
cards.desc: The face suggests that of a dark woman...

cards.name: King of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Valour, realizing intelligence, business...
cards.meaning_rev: Vice, weakness, ugliness, perversity, corruption, peril.
cards.desc: The figure calls for no special description...

cards.name: Ace of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Perfect contentment, felicity, ecstasy; also speedy intelligence; gold.
cards.meaning_rev: The evil side of wealth, bad intelligence; also great riches...
cards.desc: A hand--issuing, as usual, from a cloud--holds up a pentacle.

cards.name: Two of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: On the one hand it is represented as a card of gaiety...
cards.meaning_rev: Enforced gaiety, simulated enjoyment, literal sense...
cards.desc: A young man, in the act of dancing, has a pentacle in either hand...

cards.name: Three of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Métier, trade, skilled labour; usually, however, regarded as a card of nobility...
cards.meaning_rev: Mediocrity, in work and otherwise, puerility, pettiness, weakness.
cards.desc: A sculptor at his work in a monastery...

cards.name: Four of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: The surety of possessions, cleaving to that which one has...
cards.meaning_rev: Suspense, delay, opposition.
cards.desc: A crowned figure, having a pentacle over his crown...

cards.name: Five of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: The card foretells material trouble above all...
cards.meaning_rev: Disorder, chaos, ruin, discord, profligacy.
cards.desc: Two mendicants in a snow-storm pass a lighted casement.

cards.name: Six of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Presents, gifts, gratification another account says attention...
cards.meaning_rev: Desire, cupidity, envy, jealousy, illusion.
cards.desc: A person in the guise of a merchant weighs money in a pair of scales...

cards.name: Seven of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: These are exceedingly contradictory; in the main, it is a card of money...
cards.meaning_rev: Cause for anxiety regarding money which it may be proposed to lend.
cards.desc: A young man, leaning on his staff, looks intently at seven pentacles...

cards.name: Eight of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Work, employment, commission, craftsmanship...
cards.meaning_rev: Voided ambition, vanity, cupidity, exaction, usury...
cards.desc: An artist in stone at his work, which he exhibits in the form of trophies.

cards.name: Nine of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Prudence, safety, success, accomplishment, certitude, discernment.
cards.meaning_rev: Roguery, deception, voided project, bad faith.
cards.desc: A woman, with a bird upon her wrist, stands amidst a great abundance...

cards.name: Ten of Pentacles
cards.meaning_up: Gain, riches; family matters, archives, extraction...
cards.meaning_rev: Chance, fatality, loss, robbery, games of hazard...
cards.desc: A man and woman beneath an archway which gives entrance...

cards.name: Page of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Authority, overseeing, secret service, vigilance...
cards.meaning_rev: More evil side of these qualities; what is unforeseen...
cards.desc: A lithe, active figure holds a sword upright in both hands...

cards.name: Knight of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Skill, bravery, capacity, defence, address, enmity...
cards.meaning_rev: Imprudence, incapacity, extravagance.
cards.desc: He is riding in full course, as if scattering his enemies...

cards.name: Queen of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Widowhood, female sadness and embarrassment, absence...
cards.meaning_rev: Malice, bigotry, artifice, prudery, bale, deceit.
cards.desc: Her right hand raises the weapon vertically...

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Whatsoever arises out of the idea of judgment...
cards.meaning_rev: Cruelty, perversity, barbarity, perfidy, evil intention.
cards.desc: He sits in judgment, holding the unsheathed sign of his suit...

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Triumph, the excessive degree in everything, conquest...
cards.meaning_rev: The same, but the results are disastrous...
cards.desc: A hand issues from a cloud, grasping as word...

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Conformity and the equipoise which it suggests...
cards.meaning_rev: Imposture, falsehood, duplicity, disloyalty.
cards.desc: A hoodwinked female figure balances two swords upon her shoulders.

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Removal, absence, delay, division, rupture, dispersion...
cards.meaning_rev: Mental alienation, error, loss, distraction, disorder, confusion.
cards.desc: Three swords piercing a heart; cloud and rain behind.

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Vigilance, retreat, solitude, hermit's repose...
cards.meaning_rev: Wise administration, circumspection, economy, avarice...
cards.desc: The effigy of a knight in the attitude of prayer...

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Degradation, destruction, revocation, infamy...
cards.meaning_rev: The same; burial and obsequies.
cards.desc: A disdainful man looks after two retreating and dejected figures...

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Journey by water, route, way, envoy, commissionary, expedient.
cards.meaning_rev: Declaration, confession, publicity...
cards.desc: A ferryman carrying passengers in his punt to the further shore...

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Design, attempt, wish, hope, confidence; also quarrelling...
cards.meaning_rev: Good advice, counsel, instruction, slander, babbling.
cards.desc: A man in the act of carrying away five swords rapidly...

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Bad news, violent chagrin, crisis, censure...
cards.meaning_rev: Disquiet, difficulty, opposition, accident, treachery...
cards.desc: A woman, bound and hoodwinked, with the swords of the card about her...

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Death, failure, miscarriage, delay, deception...
cards.meaning_rev: Imprisonment, suspicion, doubt, reasonable fear, shame.
cards.desc: One seated on her couch in lamentation...

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.meaning_up: Whatsoever is intimated by the design; also pain...
cards.meaning_rev: Advantage, profit, success, favour, but none of these are permanent...
cards.desc: A prostrate figure, pierced by all the swords belonging to the card.
